text.text_translated:
Maybe dreams are the mind's way to sort thoughts.  
The thoughts come from the day.  
When we are awake, thoughts appear as words.  
We talk to ourselves in our head.  
Dreams have symbolic meaning.  
One part of the brain is for language.  
When we sleep, that part becomes less active.  
Another part of the brain is for feelings.  
When we sleep, that part becomes more active.
